name: What the Hell
description:
Have you ever thought about hell and wondered what it would look like?

Undoubtedly, everyone’s final desire is to be in heaven after life. But, no one thinks about
hell. This game offers you to see hell in the world. Let’s go and see it!

There are many decisive moments related to your life. Choose the answer and overcome difficulties to reach hell. Be intelligent and answer correctly in each question.

You will find an exciting adventure of the bouncing character through the tower labyrinth going down to hell following the decisions you will make.

One-tap easy-to-learn controls, rich visual effects and addictive gameplay mechanics combining decision-making and action games’ features.

Game Features:
1. Simple but addicting mechanics
The questions are tricky and realistic, you must choose it right so you can go down and reach hell eventually

2. Amazing Physics
Realistic physics will make you feel you are in the real life

3. Several unique characters for you to obtain.
How do you want to look?

4. Get excited and enjoy
Ever wonder what it was like to be in hell? Well, you’ll still have to wonder, what choice you have to make to reach Hell
